approaches.title: Using the div instruction
approaches.blurb: Use the div instruction to get a division's remainder.

approaches.title: Using the rem instruction
approaches.blurb: Use the rem instruction to get a division's remainder.

approaches.title: Using a "divisible by" macro
approaches.blurb: Define a macro to avoid repeating code too often.

approaches.title: Using the andi instruction
approaches.blurb: Use the andi instruction to determine if a number is divisible by 4.
